description: Sapio is a smart restaurant run by a young couple: Roberta Cozzetto provides a courteous, elegant welcome front of house, while Alessandro Ingiulla is in the kitchen preparing modern dishes that are a feast for the eyes as well as the palate, using fresh ingredients from this magnificent island.
